name: 尤正吉
objective:
先修課程：無

機構被用來傳遞運動和力量，在真實的世界裡隨處可見。常用的機構包括連桿、齒輪、凸輪、皮帶、鏈條、繩索、螺旋、和摩擦傳動機構，在 “機動學” 中我們將學習如何利用解析法與作圖法分析包括連桿、齒輪和凸輪之運動，並認識這些理論如何應用於車輛機構上的分析。
schedule:
1.Introduction, Constraint Analysis
2.Four-Bar Linkages
3.Inversion, Motion Limits
4.Special Mechanisms, Midterm (1)
5.Analytical Linkage Analysis-Four-Bar Linkage
6.Analytical Linkage Analysis-Slider-Crank Mechanism
7.Analytical Linkage Analysis-Slider-Crank Inversion
8.Graphic Linkage Analysis, Instant Center of Velocity
9.Midterm (2)
10.Spun Gear (1)
11.Spun Gear (2)
12.Helical Gear
13.Bevel Gear, Midterm (3)
14.Simple and Compound Gear Train
15.Planetary Gear Train
16.Cam-Follower System
17.Dragon Boat Festival
18.Midterm (4)
materials:
Textbook:
K. J. Waldron,G. L. Kinzel,  and S. K. Agrawal, "Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of  Machinery", 3rd, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2016, pp. 1-58, 279-394, 431-578. (歐亞書局)
Reference:
Martin, G. H., Kinematics and Dynamics of Machines, McGraw-Hill Publishing Co., 1982.
